item.title: Year In Review 2020
item.description: Happy New Year 2020 is over. Thankfully. This might be tempting the fates just a bit, but really, 2021 has got to be better right! Team VideoTranslator: Happy New Year Jokes aside, the big learning from 2020 was to be more grateful. The strength shown by people worldwide was extraordinary, and we could not be more grateful for the kindness of strangers, friends, and family in what was a difficult time.

item.title: How Vyasa University Is Fighting Covid With Video Translation
item.description: Vivekananda Yoga Anusandhana Samsthana or VYASA is a registered charitable institution (1986) working to make Yoga a socially relevant field of study. Based on the teachings of Swami Vivekananda, Vyasa University combines the four streams of Yoga with unity in their diversity, the key essence of Indian culture, applications of Yoga to bring health, harmony, peace the world over are now spread across the globe in nearly 30 countries. Vyasa University: Using scientific research to bring Yoga into the modern world!
